Analysis Workflows.description: Procedures for analyzing codebases and memory-first operations

Task Planning.description: Design and creation of task prompts and roadmaps

Task Revision and Correction.description: Critical corrections and revisions to task prompts and execution plans based on source code verification

Agent-based Architectures.description: Multi-agent parallel execution architectures for large-scale tasks: verification path + exploration path + synthesis

Java 17 Support Assessment.description: Comprehensive evaluation of CPG's support for Java 11-17 language features using multi-agent analysis

Batch Processing Patterns.description: Batch processing execution patterns for long-running tasks with account limits and interruptibility requirements

Queue-based Architectures.description: Dynamic queue architectures with planning queue (serial) and execution queue (parallel batch processing), supporting context offloading and concurrent control

Static Analysis Algorithms.description: Academic research on interprocedural analysis, call graphs, alias analysis, symbolic execution, and SSA

Containerized Architecture.description: Build-once-query-many architecture: container-based separation of graph construction and querying

Resource Planning.description: HR resource analysis, team structure, skills analysis, and staffing requirements for CPG defect remediation

CPG Gap Analysis.description: Analysis of CPG defects and Java-specialized fork strategy

Source Code Investigation.description: Deep source code investigation for Scenario verification and defect discovery (6000+ lines of code analyzed)

Unreachable Code Analysis.description: Constant evaluation and branch pruning for dead code detection

CPG Core.description: Core graph structure, nodes, edges, and passes

Query API DSL.description: Query DSL for graph traversal and analysis

Graph-Query Collaboration.description: Collaboration between graph layer and query layer

Memory System.description: File-based external memory system: architecture, operations, and mandatory workflows

Context Optimization.description: Strategies for managing context window and preventing overflow in large tasks

Documentation Tools.description: Automation tools for markdown table validation and diagram creation

Visualization Reference.description: Complete reference for Mermaid diagrams from official documentation (MCP Ref)

Document Localization.description: Localization of technical documentation from English-heavy to Chinese-first format
